attributes.action: make all local councils provide moveable weekly refuge collection bins
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: as still many local councils still do not supply moveable refuge bins weekly collections our area we have to put backs out on pavement this is a hazard also a health hazard attacting vermon i wish that in all local areas these removrable bins are phased in by no later than 2011
